page.title: Eduardo (MrSev7en)
page.description: My name is Eduardo Dias, I'm currently 18 years old and I'm a website and app developer. I've always been passionate about technology and that's why I decided to dedicate myself to it. Currently I don't work with development, but I'm always studying and perfecting myself so that one day I can work with it.
page.author: MrSev7en

title.2: "Technology and programming lover. Always looking to improve my knowledge and learn new things."

subtitle.0: Hi to you! My name is Eduardo Dias, I'm 18 years old (I'll be 19 on April 24th) and I'm a website and application programmer.
subtitle.1: I've always liked technology, and since I was little I've always had an interest in computers, so I decided to dedicate myself to that. Currently I don't work with development, but I'm always studying and perfecting myself so that one day I can work with it.
subtitle.2: My goal is to become a developer with great knowledge and experience, so I can help other people and companies to develop their projects.
subtitle.3: I have already developed several projects, both for myself and for other people, and I am always willing to help and contribute with what I know.
